Method Detail

addWorkDesktop

public void addWorkDesktop(WorkDesktop wd)
Adds a work desktop, where visualization for a working data set will be added. Each WorkDesktop is a Tab added to the application desktop STILL IN DEVELOPMENT: By now, ony one working desktop is built. Besides, it has no much more sene to have more than one work desktop, since only one can be active at the same time

Parameters:
wd - WorkDesktop to add

setActiveWorkDesktop

public void setActiveWorkDesktop(WorkDesktop wd)
Stablishes the active WorkDesktop

Parameters:
wd - the WorkDesktop to activate
